mapper.update:
update
set productId = #{productId}, orderNum = #{orderNum}, modifyUserId = #{modifyUserId}, modifyTime = #{modifyTime} where productCategoryDetailId = #{productCategoryDetailId}

update
set
productCategoryId = #{productCategoryId},
productId = #{productId},
orderNum = #{orderNum},
effective = #{effective},
modifyUserId = #{modifyUserId}, modifyTime = #{modifyTime} where productCategoryDetailId = #{productCategoryDetailId}
mapper.select:
select
from
where 1=1 and productCategoryId = #{pd.productCategoryId}
and ( productCategoryDetailCode LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') or productCategoryDetailName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') )
order by (orderNum+0)
